name: Brite Baldi's Basics: Bright Colors Edition
name_original: Brite Baldi's Basics: Bright Colors Edition
description:
Are you ready for a remastered version of Baldi?

Well, you have it!

Baldi is back, but he has turned the school into bright colors using the power of lightning! Escape the school before you are trapped! Don't let Baldi get you! Try to get the secret red letters ending! And the more rare ending... T-Pose Man! Can you escape the school?
